docstring:
/** * Returns a string containing the data in JSON format. The format is * an array of arrays, where each sub-array represents one data value. * The sub-array should contain two items, first the item key as a string * and second the item value as a number. For example: * {@code [["Key A", 1.0], ["Key B", 2.0]]} *

* Note that this method can be used with instances of {@link PieDataset}. * * @param data the data ({@code null} not permitted). * * @return A string in JSON format. */
